title: ContextSuite Semantic Event Involved Entity
description: Schema for an entity involved in a semantic event.

label.description: Optional label for this involvement instance or the entity it points to.

role.description: Role of the entity in the event (e.g., Supplier, Buyer).

entity_type.description: Type of the entity involved (e.g., Person, Organization).

entity_gid.description: Graph UUID of the involved entity, if known.

id.description: The actual identifier string for the involved entity.

id_type.description: The type or source of the identifier (e.g., 'Zendesk ID', 'Stripe ID').

capacity.description: Capacity of the entity in the event (e.g., fractional involvement).
